page.title: 11THE WEAVER
page.content: The weaver is to be found at "Sweet Brier" on the Main Street. You can go in and watch the Weaver making all sorts of rugs. She first opened in April l985, so she has not had a lot of visitors so far. She has two bigger shops in Aberdeen and Glasgow. She uses Cheviot wool for travelling rugs, tweed and wool for knee rugs, and fine wool for cushions. It takes 5.5 days to set everything up and weave a floor rug, but once everything is set up it only takes 2 days. The colours that the weaver uses in her products are natural colours like dark red, blue, brown and green which are very much like the colours of the land scape around Tomintoul itself. Visitors are made very welcome and can drop in at any time during the day.
